scenario.summary: Jezero crater has been selected as a possible location for the first colony on Mars, there should be an ample supply of water from the subterranian ice scarps located in the crater making this an ideal location for establishing our first colony, and should support a large population.\n\nGoal: Reach a colony size of 100
